results.name: Triangle of sum of two primes: p(n)+p(k) with n >= k >= 1.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, First 125 rows of triangle, flattened
Index entries for sequences related to Goldbach conjecture
formula: a(n, k) =2*A065305(n, k) [but note different offset]
program: a065342_tabl = zipWith (map . (+)) a000040_list $ tail $ inits a000040_list
xref: Cf. A052147 (left edge), A100484 (right edge), A000040.
